2025-09-18FINIncome Tax ActRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (2023 to 2024 Livestock Deferral)Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (2023 to 2024 Livestock Deferral) in order to prescribe the drought, flood and excess moisture regions that are eligible for tax relief in the 2023 to 2024 taxation years.Registration: SOR/2025-0194 Publication Date: 2025-10-08
subject: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (2023 to 2024 Livestock Deferral)
precis: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (2023 to 2024 Livestock Deferral) in order to prescribe the drought, flood and excess moisture regions that are eligible for tax relief in the 2023 to 2024 taxation years.
